name: Stranded On Mars
description:
“Stranded on Mars” is a tower defense style game where you have to defend against waves of alien enemies attacking your base. As the time goes on, the waves of enemies gets progressively more difficult to defeat, and you have to manage your resources to survive.

As time goes on, the weather becomes worse reducing visibility and adding onto the challenge.

This project was made by team Triple AAA Battery for the 2018 Unreal Engine 4 Summer Game Jam.

Controls: 

WASD - Move

Tab - Open Shop

Left Click - Place Turret

Escape - Open Pause menu
